entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Swan River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swan River 9:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -21.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -27.4°C
Wind: NW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 32. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 30 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
